summary: This is the story of the decades-long love affair between June Carter and her husband, Johnny Cash, a love that was stretched to the breaking point by Johnny's addiction to pills.
cast: Jewel Kilcher|Matt Ross|John Doe|Frances Conroy|Austin M. Stack|Mary Stewart Sullivan|Leah Peasall|Travis Smith|Michelle Kabashinski|Emma Peasall|Hannah Peasall|Erin Beute|Julia Peasall|Sarah Peasall|John Wesley Walters|Andy Stahl|Linds Edwards|John Roach|Jim Gray|Alan Heckner|Robert Larriviere|Wilbur Fitzgerald|Jessica Rose Smith|Ellie Dusek|Sterling Adams|Steve Bowlin|Justin Price|James Lykens|Charles Edward Longoria|Emily Dunlop|Cameron Thor|Matthew Cornwell|Brooke Jaye Taylor|Scott Burns|Katy Harper|Blake Ivey|Trey McGriff|Braeden Orr|David Lee Poe Jr.|Joel Rogers|Kim Vickery
title: Ring of Fire
